# Exercise 1 Basic dplyr

```{r load packages}
library("gapminder")
library("dplyr")
```

# 1.1 Filter

```{r filter dataset}
gapminder %>% filter(year %in% (1970:1979), country %in% c("Canada", "Brazil", "Germany"))
```
# Exercise 1.2

```{r}

gapminder  %>% 
  filter(year %in% (1970:1979), country %in% c("Canada", "Brazil", "Germany"))  %>% 
  select(country, gdpPercap)
```
